response.overview: Blythe and the pets of the Littlest Pet Shop love to make new friends, and those friends can take all shapes and sizes! Join Blythe and the pets as they babysit a curious kitten, befriend a genial spider and meet another fashion-minded girl. The adventures come to an exciting climax with a two-part special where Blytheâ€™s dream of holding a Pet Fest finally comes true!
response.title: Littlest Pet Shop: Making Friends
